content:
Congratulations on running a successful digital agency for the past 10 years! As a veteran digital marketer, I would be happy to help you with your website.

To begin with, here are some important pages that you should consider including on your website:

1. Home Page - This is the first page that visitors will see when they come to your website. It should clearly communicate your company's brand, mission, and services.
2. About Us - This page should provide more information about your company's history, values, and team members.
3. Services - This page should list all of the services that you offer and provide detailed descriptions of each service.
4. Portfolio - This page should showcase your previous work with clients, highlighting your expertise and experience in the digital marketing industry.
5. Testimonials - This page should feature positive reviews and feedback from previous clients to help establish credibility and trust with potential customers.
6. Blog - A blog is a great way to regularly publish informative and engaging content related to your industry, and establish your company as a thought leader.
7. Contact Us - This page should include your contact information, such as your email address, phone number, and physical address, to make it easy for potential customers to get in touch with you.

As for the content on each page, make sure to communicate your company's unique value proposition and what sets you apart from other digital agencies. Use clear, concise language and incorporate visual elements such as images and videos to make your website more engaging.

Additionally, highlight any notable clients or partnerships you have worked with, as well as any awards or accolades your company has received.

I hope this helps! Best of luck with your new website.
